sentences.en: "Gimme a break, kid! You know how much those things cost?"
sentences.cn: “饶了我吧，小祖宗！你知道这些东西有多贵吗？”

sentences.en: A cassette/radio is included at no extra cost .
sentences.cn: 附送一台卡式收录机。

sentences.en: A full day’s activities will cost you £45.
sentences.cn: 全天的活动需要45英镑。

sentences.en: All vessels were to be built on a cost-plus basis.
sentences.cn: 所有的船只都将在成本加利润的基础上制造。

sentences.en: At this rate we’ll barely cover our costs (= make enough money to pay for the things we have bought ) .
sentences.cn: 照这样下去，我们只勉强够支付成本。

sentences.en: Badges are also available at a cost of £2.50.
sentences.cn: 徽章也有卖的，2.5英镑一枚。

sentences.en: Calls cost 36p (cheap rate) and 48p (peak rate) per minute.
sentences.cn: 电话每分钟36便士（优惠费率）和48便士（高峰费率）。

sentences.en: Companies are moving jobs to towns with a lower cost of living.
sentences.cn: 各公司正在把工作岗位转移至生活费用较低的城镇。

sentences.en: he was anxious to avoid war at all costs.
sentences.cn: 他愿不惜一切代价来避免战争。

sentences.en: He was stunned to discover cost overruns of at least $1 billion.
sentences.cn: 他震惊地发现花费至少超了10亿美元。

sentences.en: I offered to pay the cost of the taxi.
sentences.cn: 我提出支付出租车费。

sentences.en: Insurance to cover the cost of a funeral is possible.
sentences.cn: 可以用保险支付葬礼费用。

sentences.en: low cost housing
sentences.cn: 低成本住宅

sentences.en: Splitting the price six ways had still cost them each a bundle.
sentences.cn: 即使把价钱平摊成6份，每人也还是要花一大笔钱。

sentences.en: The bank must be run in a cost-effective way.
sentences.cn: 银行的经营必须追求成本效益。

sentences.en: The company has made heroic efforts at cost reduction.
sentences.cn: 公司在降低成本方面付出了艰苦卓绝的努力。

sentences.en: The cost of electricity from coal-fired stations is expected to fall.
sentences.cn: 用煤作燃料的火力发电站的成本有望降低。

sentences.en: The cushions, shown left, measure 20× 12 inches and cost $39.95.
sentences.cn: 展示在左边的垫子，长20英寸宽12英寸，价格是39.95美元。

sentences.en: The funds will just cover the museum’s running costs .
sentences.cn: 这些资金只够支付博物馆的运转费用。

sentences.en: the high cost of production
sentences.cn: 很高的生产成本

sentences.en: The new building’s going up at a cost of $82 million.
sentences.cn: 新大楼正以8,200万美元的造价拔地而起。

sentences.en: The new shopping centre was constructed at a cost of 1.1 million.
sentences.cn: 新建成的购物中心耗资110万。

sentences.en: the terrible cost of the war in death and suffering
sentences.cn: 这场战争造成的死亡与苦难的惨重代价

sentences.en: The total cost of the project would be more than $240 million.
sentences.cn: 该项目的总成本会超过2.4亿美元。

sentences.en: They struggled to limit the cost by enforcing a low-tech specification.
sentences.cn: 他们通过实施低技术规格拼命限制成本。

sentences.en: they were really bad mistakes on my part and they cost us dear.
sentences.cn: 这是我犯的严重错误，使我们遭受了极大损失。

sentences.en: This doesn’t include the cost of repairing the damage.
sentences.cn: 这不包括修理破损的费用。

sentences.en: Those figures might not even cover the cost of breakages.
sentences.cn: 那笔钱甚至都不够赔偿破损费。

sentences.en: We’ll get the plan costed before presenting it to the board.
sentences.cn: 在把计划提交董事会以前，我们会核算成本。

sentences.en: without programmes to play on it, the cleverest machine is useless—as some hardware manufacturers already know to their cost.
sentences.cn: 没有节目可以播放，再好的机器也是无用的——这是一些硬件制造商的经验教训。
